statements: SELECT id, name, price, category, created_at FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%phone%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('electronics', 'clothing') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, price, category, created_at FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9)
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY category, price DESC
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM products WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.category = categories.category_name
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS category_name FROM products p JOIN products_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM products INNER JOIN products_categories ON products.id = products_categories.product_id WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, product_id FROM product_details WHERE weight < 1.5;
SELECT id, rating, comment FROM reviews ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, product_id FROM product_images WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, pd.color, pd.size, pd.weight FROM products p JOIN product_details pd ON p.id = pd.product_id WHERE p.id = 123;
SELECT r.product_id, p.name, r.rating, r.comment FROM reviews r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
SELECT pi.image_url, p.name FROM product_images pi JOIN products p ON pi.product_id = p.id WHERE pi.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, category, created_at FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, image_url FROM product_images WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, tag_name FROM product_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT p.name, pr.rating, pr.review FROM products p JOIN product_reviews pr ON p.id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.rating > 4;
SELECT pt.tag_name, p.name, p.price FROM product_tags pt JOIN products p ON pt.product_id = p.id WHERE pt.tag_name = 'electronics';
